Literature.Title: Phenol-Soluble-Modulin-Inspired Amphipathic Peptides Have Bactericidal Activity against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Zeng P, Xu C, Cheng Q, Liu J, Gao W, Yang X, Wong KY, Chen S, Chan KF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli NDM-1(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella oxytoca(MIC=32-128µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=16-32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NDM-1(MIC=16-32µM),Morganella morganii(MIC=>128µM),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=16-32µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 1717(MIC=>128µM)
